mapper.insert: insert into member(email, pwd, name, nick_name, pho_no, created, role) values (#{email}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phoNo}, #{created}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE email = #{email}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_email_duplicate;
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE nick_name = #{nickName}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_nickName_duplicate;
SELECT CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM member WHERE pho_no = #{phoNo}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_PhoNo_duplicate;
